full_text: UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT MEMORANDUM Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York DATE: August 12, 2019 TO: Warden N. Diaye L. FROM: S/O/S SUBJECT: Passed information from Special Housing Unit On Friday August 9, 2019 at approximately 1:50 p.m., I S/O/S passed on to oncoming staff member Office S/O/S and present shift staff S/O/S and Officer S/O/S. That Inmate Reyes #85993-054 was going WAB and possibly may not return. Also that Inmate Epstein #76318-054 will be needing a cell mate upon arrival from his attorney visit. DOJ-OGR-00026892

text_blocks.content: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
SUBJECT: Passed information from Special Housing Unit

On Friday August 9, 2019 at approximately 1:50 p.m., I S/O/S passed on to oncoming staff member Office S/O/S and present shift staff S/O/S and Officer S/O/S. That Inmate Reyes #85993-054 was going WAB and possibly may not return. Also that Inmate Epstein #76318-054 will be needing a cell mate upon arrival from his attorney visit.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions and is a memorandum from the United States Government.
